# Shortcut Romeo 2012: A Thrilling Hindi Movie with English Subtitles
 
![Shortcut Romeo 2012 poster](shortcut-romeo-2012.jpg)
 
**Shortcut Romeo 2012** is a Hindi movie that tells the story of a young man who blackmails a married woman after discovering her affair. The movie is directed by Susi Ganeshan and stars Neil Nitin Mukesh, Ameesha Patel and Puja Gupta in the lead roles. The movie is a remake of the Tamil film *Thiruttu Payale* (2006).

## What is Shortcut Romeo 2012 about?
 
**Shortcut Romeo 2012** follows the life of Suraj (Neil Nitin Mukesh), a poor and ambitious young man who wants to make it big in life. He finds a shortcut to wealth when he stumbles upon a video of a married woman, Monica (Ameesha Patel), having an affair with another man. He decides to blackmail her and extort money from her. However, things get complicated when he falls in love with Sherry (Puja Gupta), a rich girl who is unaware of his true identity and motives. Suraj also has to deal with Monica's husband (Rajesh Shringarpure), who is a powerful businessman and politician, and her lover (Jatin Grewal), who is a ruthless gangster. How will Suraj escape from this web of deceit and danger? Will he be able to win Sherry's heart and trust? Will he repent for his sins or pay the price for his greed?
